segments.text: Welcome to Al ’ s Garage . What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem at all ! I am taking a long road trip and I want to make sure my car is in good mechanical condition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very wise decision . When was the last time you had a tune up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not that long ago , I think it was four months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We usually recommend that you bring your car in every five thousand kilometers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? I mean , what exactly do you do to a car that you need to check it so often ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First of all , we change the motor oil and oil filter . If you don ’ t do this , it can cause your engine to wear faster and that means you would probably have to change the pistons and intake valves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We also check your spark plugs , fuel filter , and other oil levels such as hydraulic fluid . We also check the clutch and brakes to determine when you will need new ones .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , well , when you put it that way , it doesn ’ t seem like a waste of time and money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Trust me , regular tune ups will keep your car running smoothly and avoid break downs .
segments.speaker: S1
